battleTraits.name: Trampling Charge
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR** Or **RUINOX** unit that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Ravenous Brutes
battleTraits.effect: Add 2 to run rolls for friendly **OGOR** units while you have not used the 'Feast on Flesh' ability this battle.

battleTraits.name: Feast on Flesh

header.text: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Any Turn

battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **OGOR** unit that is in combat or that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:

 * **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.
 * Pick an enemy unit in combat with the target. You cannot pick the same enemy unit more than once. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Brutal Stock
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS MONSTER** uses the 'Trampling Charge ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any.

prayers.name: Call of the Blizzard
prayers.declare: Pick a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a terrain feature within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayers.effect: Place a **blizzard token** next to the target. Terrain features that have a **blizzard token** gain the 'Obscuring' terrain ability. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, friendly **BEASTCLAW RAIDERS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are within 3" of any terrain features that have **blizzard tokens**.

abilities.name: Troglodytic Lurkers
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **lurking on the fringes**. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Frenzied Hunters
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **lurking on the fringes**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Huskard
warscrolls.subtitle: On Store horm
warscrolls.options:
This unit is armed with Punches and Kicks, Stonehorn's Rock-hard Horns, Stonehorn's Hooves and 1 of the following options:

 * Chaintrap
 * Harpoon Launcher
 * Blood Vulture

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stonehorn's Rock-hard Horns** is 4.

abilities.name: Stone Skeleton
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Everwinter's Goad

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick each friendly and enemy **MONSTER** within this unit's combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+:

 * If the target is a friendly **OGOR MAWTRIBES** unit, its **Companion** weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.
 * If the target is an enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with its **Companion** weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability

abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

 * Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
 * Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 x 6).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Insatiable Gluttony
abilities.effect: If you have used the 'Feast on Flesh' ability this battle, add 1 to the control score of this unit for each model in this unit.
